Always clean sessions for all clients: Always clean sessions for all clients
Always keep sessions for all clients: Always keep sessions for all clients
The instance needs to be enabled to be able to test the client.
First save the adapter: The instance settings need to be saved first.
Interval before send topics by connectio: Delay before sending topics to clients after connect
Set certificates or load it first in the: Set certificates or define it first in the system settings (right top).
Use different topic names for set and ge: Use different topic names for set and get
Send state object as mqtt message: Send state object as mqtt message
Like \"javascript.0.\" to remove it from: Like "javascript.0." to remove it from all topics
All new topics will be processed as bina: All new topics will be processed as binary
These states will be published. (Divided: These states will be published. (Divided by comma, e.g. 'mqtt.0.*,javascript.*')
Subscribe for topics. (Divided by comma,: Subscribe for topics. (Divided by comma, e.g. 'mqtt/0/#,javascript/#')
Do not check if this instance is availab: Do not check if this instance is available from internet
